name: Hibee
description:
Control your bee, claim and steal bases, collect the most honey. Compete with millions of players around the world to become the most powerful bee!

Choose your bee to get started and climb to the top of the leader board. Claim your bases and fight other bees! Gameplay: Fly around and collect pollen to get bigger. Claiming bases will give you pollen every second and you will increase in size. Kill other bees to gain their pollen and reach the top of the leader board!

More updates will come soon...

Enjoy!

COMMANDS

Movement: Mouse Cusor or TouchScreen
Boost: Spacebar or DoubleTap.

PLAY ON HIBEE.IO

 Join the Discord Community
Follow us on Twitter
